member.name: IUIAnimationStoryboardEventHandler2.OnStoryboardStatusChanged
member.param: The storyboard for which the status has changed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationStoryboardEventHandler2.OnStoryboardUpdated
member.param: The storyboard that has been updated.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationStoryboardEventHandler2
member.summary: Defines methods for handling storyboard events.
